title: Mirror of Germany. No. 119 = Deutschland Speigel
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Cities and towns
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Germany - Social life and customs
History/Berlin (Germany) - History - Division of East and West
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Berlin Wall, Berlin, Germany, 1961-1989
description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: Show jumpers training at the Flottbek Course; exhibition of "Art Photography Around 1900" held at Folkwang Museum in the Ruhr district; a Jamboree of French and German youth held at Rehberge Park in West Berlin; memorial services held paying tribute to refugees from East Germany killed whilst crossing the Berlin Wall; the West German Coast Guards; their headquarters in Bremen and their latest vessels; the rebuilt city of Wurzburg; the 1964 German Grand Prix.
